sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; interface Props { id: string; img: string; title: string; cost: number; ratings: number; reviews: number; location: string; } export const TopRatedCard: React.FC = ({ id, img, title, cost, ratings, reviews, location }) => { return (

{location}

{title}

From ${cost}/person

{ratings}

  ({reviews})

); };
